should do it. but thats a whole starter. i think you only need starter =1 and the else if

if (command.startsWith("starter") && playerRights >= 0) "{" addItem(995, 25000000); addItem(1961, 200000); addItem(1333, 1); addItem(1319, 1); addItem(1725, 1); addItem(3105, 1); addItem(542, 1); addItem(544, 1); addItem(2902, 1); addItem(1155, 1); addItem(4365, 1); sendMessage("MmaScape Starter"); starter = 1; savemoreinfo(); savechar(); } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("message here."); }

try that. might not work but its trial and error =p

item.title: Limiting my starter
item.dc:creator: @Ahyo Ahyo
item.description:
@Ahyo wrote:

Ok well i recently had a problem with 100errors, which i found out the problem with some help from fellow players.

ANYWAY, a new problem faces me. after i tried the starter i coded, i noticed you get unlimited starters, which i dont like what so ever. So if anyone can help me with this i would be very appreciative, and does anyone know how to switch what your guy is equipted with when he first starts off??
Thanks

Well this is what i have now, and its still doesnt make it limited and now normal players cant get starter for some reason, only staff.

}

addItem(995, 25000000);
